law.text:
As used in KRS 45A.490 to 45A.494:
"Contract" means any agreement of a public agency, including grants and orders, for the purchase or disposal of supplies, services, construction, or any other item; and
"Public agency" has the same meaning as in KRS 61.805.
law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 162, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2010.
